thread.title: 10 intern jobs in Asia this week
thread.title_full: 10 intern jobs in Asia this week

author: Elvina Taher
title: 10 intern jobs in Asia this week

organizations.name: me creative studio  market reserach di tickled media pte ltd  tickled media pte ltd

text:
Good day folks! Here are the latest intern jobs in Asia this week!
This list will focus on highlighting digital and tech-centric intern jobs from a healthy mix of startups and companies across tech and non-tech verticals. Interested in any positions below? Click to find out more and apply away!
Recruiting and keen to list your jobs in future articles? Click here to create your company profile and post jobs. We feature jobs based on the following criteria:
The activity of recruiters on the platform. Recruiters who actively post new jobs, remove old ones and accept/reject applicants will have higher chances of being featured. Completeness of company profile and job details. Company with an incomplete profile or poor job description will not be featured. Design UI/UX Intern at Playa 
Playa is a software development company provide web development, mobile application development, and consulting services.
Work location: Hong Kong Requirement: Techy, able to pick up new technologies like a piece of cake, digital savvy with a strong awareness of web design trends, detail oriented, paying attention to the user experience on various mediums. Skills: Sketch, Adobe Illustrator. Salary Range: HKD 3,500 – 13,000 More jobs at Playa 
Tech Intern at CaptionCube 
Using a cloud-based platform and speech recognition technology, CaptionCube provides high-quality, fast captioning, transcription, and subtitling services for e-learning and media content providers. We help your videos reach a larger audience and we also provide live captioning services for events.
Work location: Singapore Requirement: Independent and self-motivated, able to work from home, experience in AngularJS, Javascript, HTML5, CSS, Python, able to work with SVN, knowledge of audio processing a huge plus. Skills: SVN, web design, Python. More jobs at CaptionCube 
Marketing Manager Trainee at ThunderQuote 
ThunderQuote is a business-to-business (B2B) services marketplace-platform that connects business buyers to the right vendors for anything they need doing.
Work location: Singapore Requirement: Have a keen interest in Marketing and startup, quick learner and motivated individual who is resourceful and can adapt to a fast pace environment, curious about the latest trends in marketing. Skills: Content marketing, digital marketing, marketing. Salary Range: SGD 600 – 1,200 More jobs at ThunderQuote 
Digital Marketing Intern at Pelago 
Pelago is a mobile first self-service event management platform allowing organizers to create, manage and sell out their events, and attendees to discover events that suit their interests.
Work location: Hong Kong Requirement: Excellent professional communication skills, highly organized and able to manage time, social media savvy, thrives in a fast-paced, autonomous environment, innovative. Skills: Cantonese language, social media, communication skills. More jobs at Pelago 
Sales & Marketing Coordinator at Evaysion 
Evaysion is an online platform focused on finding the perfect venue for the right event in Hong Kong and listing your venue.
Work location: Hong Kong Requirement: Previous experience in sales/marketing, excellent verbal and written communication skills, understanding of marketing and negotiating techniques. Skills: Business development, sales & marketing, Microsoft Office. More jobs at Evaysion 
Super Intern at Kredivest 
Kredivest is fintech peer to peer lending that aims to get your unpaid invoices paid in advance.
Work location: Jakarta, Indonesia Requirement: Comfortable with Microsoft Office, good attitude and willingness to learn, organize and responsible, ability to meet deadlines and tech savvy. Skills: Support, data management, communication skills. More jobs at Kredivest 
Full Stack Web Developer (Internship) at IT Wonders 
IT Wonders is technology startup that creates website, custom web, and mobile applications for SMEs in Singapore and Malaysia.
Work location: Johor Bahru, Malaysia Requirement: Solid understanding of the full web technology stack, working knowledge with Content Management Systems, good knowledge of latest web standards, basic Photoshop and Illustrator skill. Skills: MySQL, Git, PHP, Linux. Salary Range: MYR 300 – 500 More jobs at IT Wonders 
Junior Mobile App Developer at ME Creative Studio 
ME Creative Studio builds beautiful mobile apps. We believe that a truly beautiful app should embrace simplicity in its design while providing the awesome user experience. And that is exactly what we do every single day!
Work location: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Requirement: Minimum or no coding skills required, passionate about mobile apps, eager and driven to learn, ‘can do’ mentality. Skills: Mobile application development. Salary Range: MYR 500 – 500 More jobs at ME Creative Studio 
Market Reserach di Tickled Media Pte Ltd 
Tickled Media Pte Ltd consists of talented consultants, designers, editors, and marketers work together to create quality content for their clients. Tickled Media Pte Ltd believe, when smart people collaborate instead of competing, amazing things happen.
Work location: Singapore Requirement: Attention to detail, meticulous and ability to learn how to use survey software, have a good team player attitude, strong interest in market research knowledge, exceptional time management skills. Skills: Adobe Photoshop, market research, data analysis. Salary Range: SGD 650 – 800 More jobs at Tickled Media Pte Ltd 
UX/UI Team Intern at Investree 
Investree is a leading peer-to-peer (P2P) lending online marketplace that connects people who want to invest money with people who want to borrow money. We enable people to lend to other people in a streamlined process.
Work location: Jakarta, Indonesia Requirement: Able to develop ideas through sketches and wireframes, dynamic and able to work in a high-paced environment, have passion in startup and in interest in bringing unique ways to the financial technology. Skills: UI/UX design. More jobs at Investree 
Want to see more jobs? Click here to check out other opportunities!
Hiring? Click here to post jobs!
Want the latest job updates in your inbox? Join our mailing list here to get the best jobs in Asia’s tech scene on a weekly basis.
This post 10 intern jobs in Asia this week appeared first on Tech in Asia.
